website_summaries.verdict: Larger than average sized kickball with 10" diameter delivers great performance.
pros: Thick rubber exterior resists punctures successfully
Ball surface has tacky feel to make it easier for youngsters to catch and hold
Works well for 4-square or dodgeball as well as kickball
cons: Some may not hold air properly over time

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought this ball for grandkids for christmas. Its been played with only a few times .its march now.. Things are not left out. This ball Never held air very well. We had to blow it up everytime we used it Started breaking down immediatly and today kids came over we got the ball out of garage flat only to see cracks all over ball and air freely excaping.. I would not recommend this item . not even for a single use.. Poor quality rubber.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Weird shape
customer_reviews.text: This kick ball started out awesome. Worked great. After leaving it outside in the sun, it is now an oval shape. Tried letting some air out and refilling, and it made it a little better, but still a little wonky. It does seem to be very sturdy and well made though.
customer_reviews.author: mmphenry

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Thus ball wasn’t expensive but it didn’t last long. It was a very short time before it cracked and it leaked.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Durable, well made kickball that stands up to abuse!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality kickball, my high school students can usually flatten the cheaper ones in a game or two. This one has held up to multiple uses with no flattening or loss of air. Will definitely purchase more of this ball when ours wear out!
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Classic Kickball
customer_reviews.text: Just like when we were kids! Played with my 7 and 5 year old and they had a blast learning how to play this classic game.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great ball
customer_reviews.text: We do a lot of kickball in our cove. Whenever a ball inevitably pops we go out and get a new one. This one held up great until my dog got a hold of it!
customer_reviews.author: BeccaMomof4

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Great size for the little ones to play kick ball. Although it was a little pricey for a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wears

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it! Ready to use right out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: LOVE it! Ready to use right out of the box. It's a block party for kids in one box!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deformed and ripped
customer_reviews.text: The ball came shaped out of round, which became very apparent when inflated to the indicated pressure (2.5 psi). Additionally, upon arrival the ball came with a small tear or rip in the exterior covering. This could be a fluke, but I would recommend going to your local Walmart or sporting goods store and getting a regular 8.5” ball.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s a kick ball
customer_reviews.text: It’s a kick ball...you fill it with air and kick it. What else can be said. Durable and well made.
customer_reviews.author: KTKB

customer_reviews.title: Sad
customer_reviews.text: My dogs popped it the same day we got it
customer_reviews.author: destiny griffis

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: Great ball. Got this for my boys to pay kick ball and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: ... ball with my dog and it has held up pretty well- My dog eventually punctured it
customer_reviews.text: Classic kick ball- I bought to play kick ball with my dog and it has held up pretty well- My dog eventually punctured it, but it still remains his favorite out door ball. This ball arrives inflated which is a major plus.
customer_reviews.author: Pippen

customer_reviews.title: leaking air after 90 days
customer_reviews.text: About 90 days old and now cracked and leaking air. Was a Christmas present for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Rian Rutherford

customer_reviews.title: Great kickball, dodgeball, gagaball.
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We had a great time playing kickball, the. Gaga ball for hours with this on my family vacation, ball is sturdy and is perfect. Much fun was had with it, and much more full will be had with it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Bagge

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had the kickball for several weeks. It has stayed inflated and has played well. Not the “official” Kickball for tournaments, but a great Less expensive alternative for practice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good ball, Strong odor
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, love the vibrant color and the fun logo but the smell of the rubber is extremely strong.
customer_reviews.author: Raquel

customer_reviews.title: Quality is every thing.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this ball to some children I know along with bases and a pump and the rules so they can have fun playing Kick Ball. By the way, they had no idea I was giving the this to them, their parents told me the children are very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my nephew and he loves it. Seems to be good quality
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Light and durable, hours of group fun
customer_reviews.text: Worked well till my friend's German Shepherd got to it :-)
customer_reviews.author: Vishak Gopalan

customer_reviews.title: Just right!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are so excited to play four square and kick ball!
customer_reviews.author: megwright85

customer_reviews.title: Lasted about a month being used twice a week before ...
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a month being used twice a week before losing its roundness and becoming more of an egg than a ball.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Popped after only a few times
customer_reviews.text: Popped after only a few time my kids kicking the ball around.
customer_reviews.author: REBECCA URIARTE

customer_reviews.title: Brings back memories
customer_reviews.text: Feels and sounds just like the ones we had in school. My kid loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Toni Dale

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality ball for the family. Kids love to use it for kick baseball
customer_reviews.author: OK grandma

customer_reviews.title: Valve leak
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a Christmas present. After we pumped it up, you could hear the valve leaking. Never got to play kickball and too late to return after Christmas. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: jh

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last a month
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 boys that love to kick balls. This ball didn't hold up for a month. I'm very disappointed. Would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 th grader's lived using these for their end of year kickball tournament!
customer_reviews.author: Teach686

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality kickball. Use it in the pool, lasts much longer than a pool basketball.
customer_reviews.author: TWPinAZ

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what a kickball should be
customer_reviews.text: Just an average everyday kickball. Nothing extraordinary about it, but it is definitely not a bad product either.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Kickball Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a teacher for 29 years and this has been The best kickball I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Kent

customer_reviews.title: Great Family Fun
customer_reviews.text: Need more of this in our lives. Nothing better than making fun memories with family.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Schmoutz

customer_reviews.title: super good ball
customer_reviews.text: my 3 boys play with it! it's just perfect! real dodge ball
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic ball! GREAT SIZE! We have had many amazing family kick ball tournaments since purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: LeSieur Fam

customer_reviews.title: Kick ball
customer_reviews.text: Great ball got here inflated to, I thought that was pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: AMG55_FMCR

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Got for 5 yo grandson. Good size for him, likes kicking, rolling and throwing it. Have had 3 months, it has held up well
customer_reviews.author: sally

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy came with hole in it
customer_reviews.text: Came deflated and had a hole in it so it was unable to be inflated
customer_reviews.author: Tal S.

customer_reviews.title: Be The King Of The Kickball Court
customer_reviews.text: My son likes it. Great for pick-up kick ball games in the street with the neighbor kids.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Violet

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Ball arrived scuffed up as if already used and doesn’t look like will be durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Shevchek

customer_reviews.title: Broke to quick
customer_reviews.text: Our ball split at the seams after a few times using.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Boucher

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's designed for. Great bounce but gets extremely slippery and hard to handle when it gets wet.
customer_reviews.author: JaLisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: loved it for the family kick ball games we hosted!
customer_reviews.author: Maritssa lopez

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: came deflated pumped it up and now it's ob round. lasted 2 days. piece of junk and now I'm on my way to target today to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: SCUBADVR

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for therapy use
customer_reviews.text: Ball is great. I use it for therapysince my back operation.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D. Rockey

customer_reviews.title: Great Ball
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality ball that bounces well and stands up to abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Russ in Denver

customer_reviews.title: Not happy. Shouldn't have kicked it
customer_reviews.text: Deflated within 3 days. Not happy. Shouldn't have kicked it.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynDado4

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: So far this ball has held up well. We are currently using it for Dodge Ball.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sullivan

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports Rubber Kickball
feature_bullets: SIZE: 10” diameter ball is the recommended size for adult kickball but is designed to be fun for kids of all ages
SURFACE: Textured, tacky rubber surface that is easy to handle and won’t puncture easily or wear down quickly
DURABLE: Constructed of a durable 2-ply rubber that ensures a superior grip and long lasting durability
CLASSIC COLOR: This ball features a vibrant classic red color that offers excellent contrast for all surfaces
VERSATILE: This playground ball is for perfect for kickball, 4-square, dodgeball and other games
